title: The Matrix
storyline: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh!: The Dark Side of Dimensions
storyline: Yugi and Kaiba have a special duel that transcends dimensions.

title: La La Land
storyline: A jazz pianist falls for an aspiring actress in Los Angeles.

title: Doctor Strange
storyline: A former neurosurgeon embarks on a journey of healing only to be drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

title: Predestination
storyline: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.

title: Her
storyline: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

title: Contact
storyline: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of intelligent aliens, who send plans for a mysterious machine.

title: The Butterfly Effect
storyline: Evan Treborn suffers blackouts during significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life by reading his journal.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
storyline: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: 12 Angry Men
storyline: Twelve men must decide the fate of one when one juror objects to the jury's decision.

title: Ratatouille
storyline: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

title: Rocky
storyline: Rocky Balboa, a small-time boxer, gets a supremely rare chance to fight heavy-weight champion Apollo Creed in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.
